mapper.select: SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master2019 BOARD_MNO_PK)*/ bm_no FROM board_master2019 WHERE rownum=1),0)+1 bm_no FROM dual
SELECT NVL((SELECT /*+index_desc(board_master2019 i_group)*/ bm_group FROM board_master2019 WHERE rownum=1 AND bm_group > 0),0)+1 bm_group FROM dual

SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_date, NVL(bs.bs_file,'') bs_file, bm.bm_hit ,bm.bm_group, bm.bm_pos, bm.bm_step, bm.bm_email, bm.bm_pw ,bm.bm_writer, bm.bm_content FROM board_master2019 bm ,board_sub2019 bs WHERE bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm.bm_title LIKE '%'||#{tb_search}||'%'
AND bm.bm_no = #{bm_no}
ORDER BY bm_group desc, bm_step asc
SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_date, bs.bs_file, bm.bm_hit FROM board_master2019 bm ,board_sub2019 bs WHERE bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
